user_query: I want to learn about machine learning and find top companies and influencers in this field.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of online resources (articles, courses, tutorials) for learning machine learning.
Compile a list of top companies working in the machine learning sector.
Identify and list influential figures in the machine learning community.
Synthesize the information from subtasks 1, 2, and 3 into a cohesive learning guide.
